code: import{ADD_TODO,DELETE_TODO,TOGGLE_TODO}from"./types";const initialState=[];const todoReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_TODO:return[...state,action.payload];case TOGGLE_TODO:return state.map(todo=>{if(todo.id===action.payload){return{...todo,isComplete:!todo.isComplete};}return todo;});case DELETE_TODO:return state.filter(todo=>todo.id!==action.payload);default:return state;}};export default todoReducer;
